overview: When reformed bad boy Johnny (Roman Todd) settles down with caring new wife Charlotte (Victoria Skye) he vows to stay on the straight and narrow. But when Charlotte's younger brother Jayden (Calvin Banks) comes to visit, horny Johnny can't help but notice his teenage brother-in-law is hung like a horse. As sexual tension builds between Johnny and Calvin, Charlotte's gorgeous friends Eric (Billy Santoro) and Paul (Griffin Barrows) take the opportunity to hit on the hot new brothers.
title: His Hot Brother In Law
